content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal mine at position (16.0, 0.0)
Consists of Burner Mining Drill (position 16.0, 0.0) and a chest (position 15.5, -1.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (16.0, 71.0)
Consists of Burner Mining Drill (position 16.0, 71.0) and a chest (position 15.5, 69.5)

### Iron smelter at position (18.0, 70.0)
Consists of Stone Furnace (position 18.0, 70.0), inserter (position 18.5, 68.5), inserter (position 18.5, 71.5), Burner Inserter (position 16.5, 69.5) and Inserter (position 19.5, 68.5)
- BeltGroup (positions (16.5, 68.5) to (18.5, 67.5)) that connects to inserter (position 18.5, 68.5)
- BeltGroup (positions (18.5, 72.5) to (18.5, 74.5)) that connects to inserter (position 19.5, 74.5)
- BeltGroup (positions (16.5, 68.5) to (20.5, 72.5)) that connects iron plate chest (position 19.5, 69.5) to new inserter (position 19.5, 72.5)

### Electronic circuit factory at position (21.5, 74.5)
Consists of Assembling Machine 2 (position 21.5, 74.5), inserter (position 19.5, 74.5), inserter (position 23.5, 74.5), a chest (position 24.5, 74.5), an input chest (position 17.5, 74.5) and Inserter (position 19.5, 72.5)
- BeltGroup (positions (18.5, 72.5) to (18.5, 74.5)) that connects to inserter (position 19.5, 74.5)

### Electricity generator at position (-3.5, 75.0)
Consists of Boiler (position -3.5, 75.0), Steam Engine (position 1.5, 76.5) and Offshore Pump (position -9.5, 72.5)
- PipeGroup (positions (-8.5, 72.5) to (-5.5, 75.5)) that connects Offshore Pump to Boiler
- PipeGroup (positions (-2.5, 73.5) to (1.5, 73.5)) that connects Boiler to Steam Engine
- ElectricityGroup (positions (15.5, 76.5), (7.5, 76.5), (19.5, 76.5), (11.5, 76.5), (3.5, 76.5), (20.5, 76.5)) that connects to Assembling Machine 2 and other entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them in the code.

### Errors when accessing non-existent attributes of an object
- Verify that the object has the attribute you are trying to access.

### Errors when attempting to insert items into a container without having the required items in inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a container.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the power network
- Ensure that entities requiring power are connected to a power source and that the power network is properly configured.

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure the target position is clear of other entities before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with specific directions
- Verify that the target position for the entity is not occupied and is in the correct direction relative to the reference entity.

### Errors when connecting transport belts directly to containers
- Use an inserter to transfer items from containers (like chests) to transport belts.

### Errors when attempting to retrieve an entity at a specific position
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when attempting to place an entity at an unplaceable location
- Check the terrain and existing entities at the target location before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when the target position is too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place a new entity.

## NAMESPACE
### Functions
- `insert_item(entity: Any, position: Any, quantity
